fields.date_of_visit: Visit date in DD-MMM-YYYY or format shown
fields.chief_complaint: Main reason for visit or primary symptom
fields.history_of_present_illness: Detailed description of current symptoms and timeline
fields.relevant_medical_history: Previous medical conditions, surgeries, or chronic illnesses
fields.current_medications_allergies: List of current medications with dosage and known allergies

vital_signs.temperature: Body temperature in F or C
vital_signs.heart_rate: Pulse rate in beats per minute (bpm)
vital_signs.oxygen_saturation: O2 saturation percentage on room air or supplemental O2

physical_examination.general_findings: Overall physical exam findings and observations
